content: Loans Property Asked by Gary OngAsked on 11 May 2019Why I do need to pay stamp duty and conveyance fee for early redemption of my housing loan at HDB? Is it to transfer the ownership from HDB (mortgage) to me? 1 answerAnswerBump1
